text:
@realDonaldTrump @AlexAzar Well he is not.  He promoted a labradoodle breeder to oversee our Coronavirus response.  You really have the most incompetent and corrupt cabinet ever.  Just like you.  

#TrumpIsALaughingStock  #70DaysDeadlyDelay   #TrumpOwnsEveryDeath
